item.title: ORTHOPEDIC LINE
item.content: <p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Our orthopedic shoes are designed and made, in order to improve the deambulation and comfort of people. Suitable shoes (major volume) can be used in association to a customized orthotic. In the case in which the shoe has to be used to correct a specific pathology, its use has to be controlled by a specific doctor. Leathers are natural and not treated with prohibited substances. In addition, thanks also to the work of our artisans, the various elements of leathers are innovative and of the latest generation.</p>
item.author: admin
